title: Plan Refinery Feedstock Change
description: A refinery plans to switch from processing a light, sweet crude to a heavy, sour crude. A team must assess the impacts of this change.

tasks.description: Assess the metallurgical impact of the new crude, checking if its higher sulfur content will cause corrosion issues in existing equipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis identifies that several heat exchangers will be at higher risk of corrosion.

tasks.description: Evaluate the impact on product yields using the refinery's LP model.
tasks.expected_outcome: The LP model predicts lower gasoline yield and higher fuel oil yield with the new crude.

tasks.description: Determine the necessary operational changes, such as adjusting desalter operations and hydrotreater severity, to handle the new crude.
tasks.expected_outcome: A list of required operational adjustments is created to ensure a smooth transition.
